topic.title: Mothers Vital Signs Section - conformance rules

lines.i: The section includes vital signs collected for the mother in the context of labor and delivery for this pregnancy. Items collected include height, as well as body weight prior to the pregnancy and at delivery.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.9"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:363)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:362)/@code="8716-3" Vital Signs (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:361)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:364)
The text entry is drawn from the structured content contained within the entries of this section. Text is required to provide human readible content.

SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] Mothers Vital Signs Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.46)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:363)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:362)/@code="8716-3" Vital Signs (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:361)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:364)
The text entry is drawn from the structured content contained within the entries of this section. Text is required to provide human readible content.

SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] Mothers Vital Signs Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.46)

body.codeblock: <section xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3"> <id root="MDHT" extension="147593090"/> <code code="413579228"/> <title>TEXT FOR TITLE</title> <text/> <entry> <observation> <id root="MDHT" extension="1368785739"/> <code code="932500603"/> <text>Text Value</text> <effectiveTime> <low value="2013"/> <high value="2013"/> </effectiveTime> </observation> </entry> </section>
